description.part1: Angelab is a leading AI-driven quantitative trading platform designed for individual investors and institutional traders.
description.part2: Our Strategies are pursue a higher annualized percentage yield (APY) on the premise of ultimate risk control.

content.platform: Our quantitative trading strategy products are launched on a legally licensed third-party platform (such as Matrixport). The clients' funds are entrusted to the custody of the third-party platform, and we only execute trading strategies through the API (Application Programming Interface) method.
content.app: This APP is a platform developed by ourselves. Clients' funds are entrusted to cryptocurrency exchanges for custody. Clients can select their preferred products in the APP and view the real-time appreciation of their assets.
content.compliance: The fund is a legally licensed entity in the British Virgin Islands (BVI). It adheres to a complete set of compliance procedures. The minimum investment amount is US$100,000. Investors are required to pass the Know Your Customer (KYC) review and anti-money laundering review.

technology.title: Core Technology
technology.subtitle: The self-developed risk control system, on the premise of ensuring ultimate risk control, continuously pursues a higher rate of return.

riskControl.title: AI-based risk control & human-intervened risk control
riskControl.description: The risk control module includes: monitoring and management of position risks, real-time monitoring and management of asset conversion ratios, automatic adjustment and linked management of leverage, feedback and automated processing of abnormal data and signals, data monitoring alarms and real-time dashboards, as well as automatic error correction and regular self-auditing for anomalies in the strategy execution system.

one.title: High-frequency trading
one.subTitle: Capacity limited

inited.suffix: （Customers who purchased Mint No. 2 enjoy priority share）

one.content: Trade with extremely efficient strategy execution systems and infrastructure deployments，the highest monthly annualized rate of return has reached 160%.

two.title: Funding rate arbitrage
two.subTitle: Unlimited Capacity
two.content: The most conventional funding-rate arbitrage strategy in Crypto market, while achieving a maximum single-day drawdown of 0.08%, an annualized percentage yield (APY) of 24% has been realized.

three.title: Quantitative hedging
three.subTitle: Capacity limited
three.content: Through quantitative trading, intra-exchange and cross-exchange hedging is implemented, with a monthly annualized rate of return of 40%.
